text:
Two women defied the Accra city Authorities' directive on the mandatory wearing of face masks after being queried by the Police. The two, who falsely described the COVID-19 pandemic as a myth claimed they are 'spirit-filled' christians.

#StopTheSpread #WearAMask https://t.co/x3lWKXvIMx
